snippet.title: British Mario VS I.M. Meen (Mario Fan Game) by Ralorche - Full Longplay (All Chapters)
snippet.description:
British Mario VS I.M. Meen is a fangame by Ralorche. Like with Mario 5 a Day, expect some weird stuff to happen. There's even a Chapter that's specifically Sonic related, and after you beat it, you have to go into a chapter menu by putting in the password "WHY". I of course, tried out Chapter -2 since it was after -1, and it also contains one of the credits you're supposed to get for the game. After that, I played Chapters 2 through 6, each of course playing in order. After Chapter 6, you beat the game with the normal credits. Like with Mario 5 a Day, I recommend trying this fangame out for yourself, it's pretty fun and pretty interesting at the same time.
Download: https://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb&param=02&c=2&id=35139
